View research website locally.

wflow_view displays the website locally in your browser.

wflow_view(files = NULL, recent = FALSE, dry_run = FALSE, path = ".")

Arguments

files
character (default: NULL). Name(s) of the specific file(s) to open in the browser. These can be either the name(s) of the R Markdown file(s) in analysis/ or the HTML file(s) in docs/. Also, the full path(s) to the file(s) can be input or just the basename(s) of the file(s).
recent
logical (default: FALSE). If files = NULL, display the R Markdown file in analysis/ with the most recent modification time. If files = NULL and recent = FALSE, then docs/index.html is opened.
dry_run
logical (default: FALSE). Do not actually open file(s) in browser. Mainly useful for testing.
path
character (default: ".") By default the function assumes the current working directory is within the project. If this is not true, you'll need to provide the path to the project directory.

Value

Invisibly returns a character vector of the HTML files to be opened.

Details

wflow_view by default opens the file docs/index.html. To view the most recently modified HTML file, set recent = TRUE. To specify which file(s) to open, specify either the name(s) of the R Markdown or HTML file(s). The path(s) to the file(s) will be discarded, thus only HTML files in docs/ can be viewed with this function.

wflow_view uses utils::browseURL to open the HTML files in the browser. If you wish to do something non-traditional like open an HTML file that is not in docs/ or not part of a workflowr project, you can use that function directly.

See also

browseURL

Examples

## Not run: ------------------------------------
# 
# # View docs/index.html
# wflow_view()
# 
# # View the most recently modified HTML file
# wflow_view(recent = TRUE)
# 
# # View a file by specifying the R Markdown file
# # (the following two are equivalent)
# wflow_view("fname.Rmd")
# wflow_view("analysis/fname.Rmd")
# 
# # View a file by specifying the HTML file
# # (the following two are equivalent)
# wflow_view("fname.html")
# wflow_view("docs/fname.html")
# 
# # View multiple files
# wflow_view(c("fname1.Rmd", "fname2.Rmd"))
## ---------------------------------------------
